use.flag: Use Portnumber (lowest input is 0) to select smartcard reader in 0.4.x and later
Use Portnumber (lowest input is 1) to select smartcard reader in 0.4.x and later (e.g. Moneyplex: select COMX to select the Xth reader).
Use CTN (lowest input is 0) to select smartcard reader in 0.4.x and later
Use CTN (lowest input is 1) to select smartcard reader in 0.4.x and later (e.g. jameica: enter X into "Index of Reader" to select Xth smartcard reader)
